text: The Visitor is a 1979 Italian science fiction horror movie starring John Huston, Shelley Winters, Lance Henriksen, Mel Ferrer, Glenn Ford, Sam Peckinpah, Neal Boortz, Steve Somers, Franco Nero and it was directed by Giulio Paradisi. It has since garnered a cult following. ==Other websites== * Category:1979 science fiction movies Category:1979 horror movies Category:Italian science fiction movies Category:Italian horror movies Category:American science fiction horror movies Category:American independent movies Category:1970s independent movies
title: The Visitor (1979 movie)
